entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 near midnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
